# FlashFusion Platform Architecture

> Project: FlashFusion Federated Architecture
> Description: Enterprise-grade interactive visualization of the FlashFusion federated stack.

## Core Documentation
- [Policy](docs/DOC_POLICY.md) - Documentation governance and provenance rules.

- [Architecture](docs/ARCHITECTURE.md) - System design and boundaries.
- [Framework](docs/FRAMEWORK.md) - Tech stack and tools.
- [Changelog](docs/CHANGELOG.md) - Version history.

## Agents
